data.title: Largest airports and airlines in Germany
data.meta_description: The 30 biggest airports in Germany and 8 airlines with further information and data
data.text:
The 30 largest airports and airlines in Germany

Further information is provided on the 30 biggest airports in Germany. At Frankfurt on the Main Airport alone, 100 airlines operate and serve flights to and from 239 destinations.

Out of the nine airlines of the country we have listed biggest 8. Lufthansa is leading here with a total of 220 flight destinations.

› Transport + infrastructure in Germany

› The largest airports worldwide
